name: Hot Wheels Battle Force 5
description:
Join Team Battle Force 5 where your mission is simple - defend the Earth from invading aliens with your battle-ready vehicle. Race, smash, and bash your way to victory. The fate of our planet hangs in the balance!

Features

• Battle Ready Vehicles, Ultra-fast Drivers, Evil Predators and Sinister Machines
• Play as Good or Bad Guy
• Melee Weapons, Extreme Moves & Stunts,
• Power Upgrades & Unlocks, Shields & Cammo
• Play as all five characters from the TV show
• Locations & settings from the TV show
• Unique Battle & Racing Zones
• Combat Racing!
